meanings.definition: Not having official permission or authorization.
meanings.sent1: The unlicensed driver was caught by the police.
meanings.sent2: The unlicensed software could cause problems for your computer.
meanings.sent3: The unlicensed pet parrot started giving driving lessons.
meanings.sent4: Her unlicensed artwork painted the town with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The unlicensed restaurant served up a feast of flavors.

meanings.sent1: He was stopped for driving unlicensed.
meanings.sent2: The unlicensed contractor was fined for his work.
meanings.sent3: The unlicensed magician tried to make his license disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her unlicensed fishing rod caught the biggest fish in the lake.
meanings.sent5: The unlicensed doctor prescribed laughter as the best medicine.
